document_data.name: ''Blackjammer's Cutlass''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Blackjammer's cutlass''''' was a ''+3 [[Intelligent item|intelligent]] [[cutlass|heavy cutlass]]'' that was highly desired and renowned by [[spelljammer]] pirates and marauders.{{Cite dragon/159/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Magic from the stars}}
document_data.Description: Although it was a heavy cutlass of ancient design, ''Blackjammer's cutlass'' was surprisingly light. The blade did not appear to be made of metal, save for the hilt, and its cutting edge was composed of a material resembling a dull, matte [[onyx]]. Its elaborate hilt was carved to resemble a keelhauled sailor.
document_data.Powers:
The ''+3 intelligent cutlass'' had powers similar to that of a [[defending]] weapon, could conjure ''[[Darkness, 15' radius|darkness]]'' within a 15' (4.6-m) radius and granted its wielder the ability to see through that obstruction.

This sword possessed a ribald personality, as well a vast knowledge of naval navigation, seamanship, and bawdy jokes. It was speculated to have granted leadership abilities to several of its wielders, as it was known to inspire confidence and morale in their respective pirate crews. Furthermore, it drew its wielder more and more into a life of piracy, imposing some of its personality on them.
document_data.History:
The blade was rumored to have been forged in one of the [[Tears of Selûne]], and wielded by a [[spelljammer|spelljamming]] [[pirate]] who earned [[Blackjammer (pirate)|his name]] from the blade itself. Blackjammer was known to raid [[Realmspace]] up until his death in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].

The cutlass passed from owner to owner for several years until coming into the possession of [[Elsun]], the captain of the [[Dragon Claw (ship)|''Dragon Claw'']]. After Elsun was killed in combat against a [[man-o-war]] of the [[Elven Imperial Navy]], ''Blackjammer's cutlass'' was lost overboard and last seen floating in [[the Flow]] between the [[crystal sphere]]s [[Oerth]] and [[Krynn]].
